summary: Turning the zombie film on its head, this film is an oddball comedy from the perspective of the brain munching monsters themselves.
cast: Matthew Davis|Julianna Robinson|Michael Grant Terry|Betsy Beutler|Colby French|Richard Riehle|Jack Orend|Joel McCrary|Tracey Walter|Oren Skoog|Will Stiles|Michael Cornacchia|Larry Weissman|Dominique Purdy|Stephen Simon|Jon Monastero|McKay Stewart|Steve Kim|Matthew Hatchette|Tony Snegoff|Loren Dennis|Larnell Stovall|Ronald Kohnen|Kelly Hughes|Edward Conna|Dwayne Standridge|Marque Ohmes|David Kiiskinen|Mandy McMillian|Crystal Hoffman|Cary Joseph|Allan Hagan|Joseph Gatto|Richard Miranda|Abran Trujillo|Scott Rosen|Bill Leaman|Luke LaFontaine|Luke Darnell|Christopher 'Critter' Antonucci|Samuel Reynolds|Danny Downey|Kim Robert Koscki|John Ross|Manuel Torres|Louis Reyes Alvarez III|Robert Castanon|Carlos Huirez|Matthew Kohnen|Sean Kohnen|Jose David Acevedo|Tess Bodley|David Garcia
title: Zombie Town
